text: I'm Caitlyn and I'm here at the friends
experience the one in New York City to
give you an inside look at our Flagship
location the friends experience is truly
the ultimate destination for any fan of
the show and we've got touring locations
all over the world but right here at the
corner of 23rd in Lexington the one in
New York City is our permanent Flagship
location with over 18 Nostalgia packed
rooms and more than 25 original props
and costumes it's truly an incredible
experience we've got tons of behind
the-scenes content including interviews
with the show creators costume designers
artists and
more throughout the experience there are
mes to your favorite scenes the best
episodes and you can even recreate those
moments for
yourself there are layers and layers of
detail to discover more layers even than
Rachel's
trifle we've also got plenty of
interactive moments throughout the
experience like playing foosball in the
boy apartment drawing on some magn
Doodles or testing your knowledge with
friends
trivia it's hard to believe that 2024
marks the 30th anniversary of friends
but what's not hard to believe is the
impact that it's been having for each
one of those 30 years being the
producers of the friends experience we
get to see fans come through the space
every day sharing the emotional
connections they have with the
characters and their stories the friends
they've made throughout their fandom it
truly is a wonderful thing to be a part
of and we can't wait for the next 30
Years and of course no friends
experience would be complete without
everyone's favorite coffee shop after
all since perk is only 97 steps away
here at the one in New York City you can
even grab a cup of
[Music]
coffee thanks for joining us on this
inside look at the friends experience
the one in New York City we can't wait
to have you come experience it for
yourself we'll see you soon
